name: Etch-a-Sketch
description: Play this game by hovering over the grid. A random color will be generated on each square as you pass over it for the first time. For every next 9 passes, 10% of black is added to the square, finally ending up in a black square. The resize button can be cliked to change the grid size.

name: Calculator
description: Calculator created with HTML, CSS and Vanilla JS.

name: Signup Form
description: A simlpe sign-up form that features HTML's in-built form validation, as awell as javascript form validation.

name: Admin Dashboard
description: This dashboard is basically a display of css stylinng using grids and flexboxes.

name: Library
description: You can add and delete books in this library as well as edit their read status.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: Vanilla JS Tic Tac Toe project

name: Restaurant
description: A simple Vanilla JS proejct, bundled using webpack.

name: Memory Card Game
description: A React based web app which simluates a memory game: Get points for choosing a card, but don't choose the same card twice!

name: To-Do List
description: a seemingly simple but quite a complex app made in pure Vanilla Jacascript.

name: CV-Maker
description: Build a simple and minimalistic resume with this React app, which uses only class components.

name: Shopping Cart
description: A react app that lets you add items to cart. Each item has an increment/decrement button as well.The app uses react routing to implement browsing across different tabs.
